body: Can we have youtube in there? Just for anyone who does Videos. Sorry idk where to post this.
body_tagged: Can we have youtube in there? Just for anyone who does Videos. Sorry idk where to post this.
title: Youtube in Your Profile

replies.body:
You can post any youtube videos of Avicus in the Community Creations tab!

---
Hopefully that  clears it up!

Regards,
Tiger
replies.body_tagged:
You can post any youtube videos of Avicus in the Community Creations tab!

---
Hopefully that  clears it up!

Regards,
Tiger

replies.body:
Community creations for if your channel is purely Avicus related
Off Topic if it's a channel with other content
I recommend you create a video hub, which is one post that you update when you upload a video
For any other help regarding this, contact anyone with the Media rank or the Senior Mods
replies.body_tagged:
Community creations for if your channel is purely Avicus related
Off Topic if it's a channel with other content
I recommend you create a video hub, which is one post that you update when you upload a video
For any other help regarding this, contact anyone with the Media rank or the Senior Mods
